[Secretary Taney's report]

Charles C. Burleigh; William H. Burleigh

Section: Item Display

Our acknowledgements are due to the Hon. Ebenezer Young, for a copy of Secretary
Taney’s Bank Report.

Section: Featured Content

Above: Chief Justice Roger B. Taney, photograph by Mathew Brady

Commentary

This is the same Roger B. Taney (1777-1864) who wrote the infamous Dred Scott decision when he was the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States. He was always adamently anti-Abolitionist. At the time of this writing, he was serving as Secretary of the Treasury under President Andrew Jackson.
